<dokuteaser>

Git的来源?

Git是一个分布式版本控制／软件配置管理软件，原来是linux内核开发者林纳斯·托瓦兹（Linus Torvalds）为了更好地管理linux内核开发而创立的。

Git 简史

Git的发展历史

Learn more about DokuWiki features </dokuteaser>

<dokuteaser>

如何使用Git的100个场景

Wikis are quick to update and new pages are easily added. Designed for collaboration while maintaining a history of every change, DokuWiki could be used as

  • git设置
  • Private notebook
  • Software manual
  • Project workspace
  • CMS – intranet

</dokuteaser>

<dokuteaser>

Customizing DokuWiki

We support customization on all levels of expertise. From easy configuration via the admin interface through downloading of templates and plugins to developing your own extensions.

  • Configuration
  • Plugins
  • Templates (aka. skins/themes)
  • Tips & tricks

Read the development manual </dokuteaser>
